markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Munitions Machinist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3172) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Munitions Crafter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3158); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You’re adept at crafting ammunition. You gain the [Quick Alchemy benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=3282) and 4 versatile vials, but can only use Quick Vial to create bombs or alchemical ammunition.

<title level="2">Munitions Machinist leads to...</title>
[Precious Munitions](/Feats.aspx?ID=3185)
name: Munitions Machinist
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Munitions Crafter](/Feats.aspx?ID=3158); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You're particularly adept at crafting ammunition and bombs.
</summary>
summary: You're particularly adept at crafting ammunition and bombs.
